29: "Welcome to my place of healing, Avatar."
"I hope thou needest not my services!"
"I hope this visit is for pleasure, not business!"
"But gladly can I say that none of your party is dead!"
"I've cared for the @unfit here for threescore years!"
"'Cah,' that is the word of sacrifice."
915: "Wilt thou make an offering of 30 gold?"
Tara approaches $Y and binds the wounds.
"If thou wilt not pay, I cannot heal thee."
1311: "I'm sorry. Without an offering I cannot heal thee."
"Thou art poor, but thy cause is just."
Sasha approaches $Y and binds the wounds.
1507: "Is there aught else I can do for thee?"
1746: "Wilt thou make an offering of 10 gold?"
Tara grabs a vial and pours it down $Y's throat.
"If thou wilt not pay, I cannot heal thee."
2174: "I'm sorry. Without an offering I cannot heal thee."
"Thou art poor, but thy cause is just."
Tara grabs a vial and pours it down $Y's throat.
2401: "Oh! I see that $Y carries a fallen comrade!"
"Wilt thou make an offering of 400 gold?"
"Then there is naught I can do save grieve with thee."
2587: Your party takes up a collection for their fallen comrade.
2926: Tara lays hands upon the corpse...
"I see that $Y carries another slain friend."
